body.p:
Williamsburg Jan 19th
Mr Wm C Gillis
After my Respets to you we are all well and they is nothing of importence a doing heare and nothing strainge

I heare inclose you the petitione of S M Cox to the Govener and I want you to see him and to try to gite him to Remite the fine he and by so doing you will oblige. Your friend if he Remits send the Remitance to John to me as Cox will be left the Contrey before he can git it
